授業目的: To enable students to communicate smoothly in English.
到達目標: To enable students to communicate smoothly in English.
授業方法:
From April 22 this class is online.

This is a practical class. The teacher is there to help and guide but it is only by actively studying at home that students will benefit and improve. It is therefore a student-entered class.

トピック.授業外学習2: Prepare by writing your journal. Each week you will be asked to write a page on a topic. It is important that you do this.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Topic Talk Issues by Kirsty McLean (EFL Press)
評価.学生による授業評価の方法Course Evaluation by Student: Students will be asked to make comments and requests anonymously.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Grades will be based on performance in class, mini tests and a final test.
評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
Grades will be based on work submitted, mini tests and a final test.
評価.備考Note0: We will try to cover the material covered in the outline. However due to classes being online there may be changes. Please understand that we must be flexible to adapt to the current situation.

name: 【100】英語（Ｓｐｅａｋｉｎｇ）I　２／English (Speaking) I
